introduction: Commons Mass Palâsana cha Wikimedia Commons liata hmâthlâzy nata multimedia palâsa awpa ta hmâhtuhpa a pasaihpa chhaichhi sâkha a châ. Hmâthlâ zy kha sâkha hnoh sâkha châ leipa ta a hluhpi ta taopathi mah y. its Wikimedia Commons page liata moh via mah y.
